system.description: At level 10, you develop a certain "quick and dirty" knowledge of herbalism and alchemy that you can use in a pinch. As long as you are in natural surroundings (such as a forest or a cave), you can spend an hour to create any consumable item (such as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.yla4i7uz4h58mfqb]{Healing Potion (Basic)} or a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ukcav3i8dudpalir]{Tanglefoot Bag}) that costs 100 gold or less. At any given time, you may only have a number of these items equal to your Intelligence modifier in existence at once, and they only last for 8 hours before losing potency.
